title: A new HDMI certification program will make it easier to avoid crappy cables
text:
A new HDMI certification program will make it easier to avoid crappy cables 
Published By: Macworld.com - Today 
One HDMI cable is as good as another, right? Wrong. The old saying “an HDMI cable will either work or it won’t, because digital is all o...
